sections.heading: Nursing home resident day user fee
sections.text: Section 17b-321. - Determination of resident day user fee by Commissioner of Social Services. Redetermination of resident day user fee upon approval of waiver of federal requirements. Refunds or credits to nursing homes exempted from resident day user fee.Section 1
